title: Coronavirus and shielding of clinically extremely vulnerable people in England
publisher: International trade in services by subnational areas of the UK: 2018
description: Data on clinically extremely vulnerable people in England during the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic from the Shielding Behavioural Survey. Includes information on their behaviours and well-being since receiving shielding guidance.
datasetNotes: On the landing page under your download option
sizingNotes: A large number of simple tables with foot notes , each tab has a different structure.
